items.summary: Replace the bundled background music audio that plays when the user presses the floating Play button with the track requested by the user (“Binary Finary 1999”), while keeping the existing audio URL/path used by the app unchanged ("/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3").

Ensure the updated bundled audio asset is included as a static frontend asset at the existing location used by the app ("/assets/audio/background-dance.mp3"), without introducing additional audio files/paths for playback.
